html:
4.2.19  12:11 am   oh my RHYTHM GODS You Get What You Give is changing my life. was this part of the same 45-minute arrange-record session or was it separate?

     separate session, before. both sessions were supposed to be 90 minutes, but the first one was longer and the second one was shorter

4.1.19  11:47 pm   what's at the end of the rainbow?

     you?

4.1.19  11:06 pm   Did you write the music for the moon is made of cheese to experiment with key changes mid song?

     that was not the reason i wrote it, but it happened nonetheless

4.1.19  10:45 pm   I found the solution to my problems. I applied this solution and quickly found that many more problems cropped up in the absence of my previous problems. I have come to the conclusion that life is full of problems, and it's up to Us to fix as many as we can before we die.

     from what i understand, the big bang initially occured as an attempt to fix problems

4.1.19  10:12 pm   how can become as strong as you?

     as long as you want to, it will happen

4.1.19  10:05 pm   why is school hard?

     to make you stronger

4.1.19  10:00 pm   any tips for improving song structure?

     how about making the whole thing the bridge

4.1.19  9:39 pm   what is the most satisfying part of your job?

     when i get to think of ideas and then get them to appear in someone else's mind

4.1.19  9:13 pm   if there had to be an international wurtz day which day would you want it to be?

     january first

4.1.19  9:05 pm   how did you become so original? I look up to being as original as you, originally. <3

     cherish the moments when you seem to witness someone proving it's possible. as long as you can remind yourself that those occurences were real, then you're just a short hide-and-seek game away

4.1.19  9:03 pm   Do you have a 9sus4 chord for any grade of the major scale? (i mean if you have ''tasted'' everyone) 

     i'm not quite sure what you mean but yes

4.1.19  7:46 pm   What should I caption my photo?

     that depends on its contents, and context

4.1.19  6:36 pm   do we really exist

     what is exist

4.1.19  5:38 pm   what is your best score?

     2

4.1.19  5:36 pm   I live in an apartment and my neighbor always plays his drums like in the middle of the night when I am trying to sleep. What do i do

     use earplugs

4.1.19  5:16 pm   Do you think you're going to play concerts

     yes

      or make merch?

     did it but i should stop

4.1.19  4:05 pm   Have you ever used a kazoo in one of your songs?

     no

      If no, will you do it in the future?

     i was going to say no, but probably yes actually

4.1.19  3:25 pm   Will you make your own show now?

     i have been doing it for several years

4.1.19  3:25 pm   What is a book?

     an average to legitimate quantity of text

4.1.19  2:36 pm   What drives you to do what you do and keep at it?

     the forces of nature, i suppose

     Its certainly not the money, is it the appreciation from the fans, if not then would you just be happy with releasing songs for yourself and your friend? Maybe its the challenge?

Thank you. 

     someone's gotta do it

4.1.19  2:26 pm   I've been having a way higher than usual number of dreams lately involving random people from my past who I no longer have contact with (e.g. people who have died, old kindergarten classmates and teachers, old friends who I've fallen out with and haven't spoken to in months or years). It's wigging me out a bit if I'm being honest. Do you have any advice? I would really appreciate it. 

     do a brief case study. write a small business memo about the contents of the dream, what the significance of those people were in your real life, and briefly explain why their occurence in the dream was unexpected

4.1.19  2:22 pm   Did you design the different sounds your synth makes or did they come stock with the synth?

     who says i even have a synth

4.1.19  1:30 pm   Guy from 3.31.19  3:27 pm . What show would you make?

     the show i've been making, for the last several years, is essentially just titled 'bill wurtz', and it has many different sub-shows and sub-facets, all generally under one umbrella of 'bill wurtz'

4.1.19  1:22 pm   how do you make your bass lines sound so good?

     focus on making the song good, while holding the bass

4.1.19  12:58 pm   In the current video editing process, do you mind sharing a part of it that to you feels like it should be able to be a lot faster but that you're struggling with to get more efficient at?

     none of the pieces could be any quicker. the only way to gain speed is to re-imagine it entirely differently, with different pieces

4.1.19  12:51 pm   i feel like i visit this website too much. what can i do about this?

     visit it less?

4.1.19  12:33 pm   https://billwurtz.com/note200508111639.html is this where the idea for the vine came from?

     yes

4.1.19  12:25 pm   3.31.19  3:27 pm yes! do it! (please. if time permits. i'm sorry if i shouted. i understand you're busy and stuff, but) yes! i would totally watch it and buy dvds and such items.

     the show has been ongoing in its many different facets, on billwurtz dot com, for the last several years. paying is optional but not discouraged, and can be done here. actual consumption of the content would occur on pretty much any other page throughout the rest of the site

4.1.19  11:47 am   Have you ever found it strange that the contraction for "we will" is pronounced the same as "will" itself?

     no. it's actually 'weel' but when said quickly (or even at a normal speed) it is indistinguishable

4.1.19  11:21 am   is bread a element

     yes

4.1.19  9:02 am   how do I not fail all these tests

     you could get failure insurance

4.1.19  7:19 am   are you ever going to do another geographical video ;{

     i just did one 2 videos ago but sure

4.1.19  6:58 am   Favourite cartoon show?

     the news

4.1.19  6:26 am   are you going to make a video for april fools, or do you have one planned

     april 1st might be a little late to plan a video for april 1st, unless it is microscopically short, or very low budget

4.1.19  5:59 am   is reality real?

     let me perform some calculations

4.1.19  4:16 am   i like art. i do art because it makes me happy. but people around me think i suck. am i a good artist or a bad one, am i even one 

     there is no way for me to know, but if you think you are good then you are good. and the fact that you asked this makes me think you might think you are good

4.1.19  2:31 am   what is an example of a pentatonic scale sounding western? 

     maybe this

4.1.19  2:12 am   is cereal soup? asking because my friends will not shut up about it

     it's a sandwich

4.1.19  1:24 am   what is the most beautiful sound? is it silence?

     light

4.1.19  12:49 am   Just watched your "history of the entire world, i guess" video. I'm curious on how long it took you to make the video

     11 months

4.1.19  12:13 am   do you think that your personality pertains to your star sign

     fuck star signs





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

3.31.19  11:52 pm   how do I become like yuo

     you could try the 'paranoid ego-maniac' costume at the local costume shop

3.31.19  10:58 pm   in your latest video. is the character select screen a reference to smash bros?

     any character select screen. probably thousands of games have screens like that

3.31.19  10:40 pm   How long does each video take to edit?

     longer than i wish

3.31.19  10:22 pm   Do you come up with (or hear well enough in your head) all the chords at the same time as the melody?

     i get the chords, but they can always be polished a little

      Or do you sometimes get ideas for melodies that need to be harmonized before they're inserted into songs?

     would never insert a melody into a song. build the song around the melody (which comes with chords baked in by default, of course. standard company policy)

3.31.19  9:24 pm   Which of your videos do you think would be best for 3d printing?

     maybe this one

3.31.19  8:37 pm   Are you planning anything for April Fool's?

     i was thinking of becoming a college professor

3.31.19  7:22 pm   why did everyone hate so called "weird" content on the internet in 2006?

     i don't know anyone who did

3.31.19  7:08 pm   where did the "a good publicity stunt is to give a fuck." quote on your shirts come from? was that something in a note or video somewhere, or did you make it up specifically for shirts?

     note

3.31.19  5:55 pm   do you believe the in God? :) 

     for anything to live up to that name they would have to have the ability to change their name, surely
